posts.post_content:
I have revised this post to be a for sale/for trade page.  Please look in my T206 Album.  Any card for sale will have a price (they are also available for trade).  Cards labeled as trade bait are only available for trade.  All other cards are not available at this time.

Make offers!

Link to album below...

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/album.php?albumid=308[/url]

For trade I would be willing to take (in order of preference) a 1934 Lou Gehrig Goudey #37 (Lower grade of course), T206 NY Highlanders, M116's, T204's (I would like one for type), a C56 Hockey card (for my wife), or if you have something oddball (color preferred) then I would consider that also.

My preferred method of payment is PayPal Gift.  Please PM or email me with your requests.

S/H is $2 per card (combined shipping available).

I already have the following Highlanders:
Jack Knight (Portrait)
Joe Lake (NY American)
Neal Ball
Hal Chase (Pink Portrait)
Hal Chase (Blue Portrait)
Jeff Sweeney (NY American)
Red Kleinow (NY American, w/bat)
Frank La Porte
Russ Ford
Keeler (Portrait)
Payne traded for Lake, see original post.

Mr. Mitchell, Mr. Phillippe, Mr. Downs, and Mr. Kroh are headed to a new home.

I would consider creative groupings for the posted cards (i.e. multiples of posted cards for one, or vice-versa).

Thanks!

Updated for new possible trade opportunities (see first post).

Thanks!

Payne arrived today, David.
Thanks for your generous trade.

Doug

Updated to reflect changes...

Thanks Doug!
Received all trade cards up to this point.  Thanks all!

Many cards are now available for outright sale.

Thanks!

Where is the link for the cards for sale?  Am I missing something?

Pm sent

Look in my albums.  Go to the T206 album and when you click on a picture it will have the price if it's for sale.

Thanks!
Added link to album directly, make offers!

Cy Seymour is off to a new home!

Thanks TEXXXX!
Ambrose has been adopted by a new home...

Dots Miller is off to a new home.

Make some offers folks!
